about_the_game:
You are a kunoichi who sneaked into Oedojou.

If you think it's not Japan, turn back.

If you think it's Japan, don't turn back.

Escape from patrolling soldiers.

"Oedoshigusa" is a short stealth walking simulation in which the player proceeds while judging what seems to be Japanese culture,
Japanese culture is a short stealth walking simulator.
The "Japanese culture" is based on the author's own prejudice and mood at the time of creation.

It is a so-called "8 like" game and has nothing to do with "Exit 8".

■Play time
10 to 20 minutes

Video distribution guideline
You can distribute the video without permission.
Monetization is possible within the range of functions provided by video distribution sites.
BGM is not included in this work.

Cautions
Ver1.00 requires mouse operation to start the game.

"Oedoshigusa" is a short stealth walking simulation in which the player proceeds while judging what seems to be Japanese culture,

The "Japanese culture" is based on the author's own prejudice and mood at the time of creation.

name: Oedoshigusa

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5-8500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7-10700
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
